channel.title: Trump Bump on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Trump Bump on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The White House Apparently Ordered Federal Workers to Roll Out Grok 'ASAP'
item.description: A partnership between xAI and the US government fell apart earlier this summer. Then the White House apparently got involved, per documents obtained by WIRED.
